Emlyn's plan for the future is to save money and sustain the living condition of the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase more crabs to sell it in the market

loans.name: Vashti

texts.en:
Vashti is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Vashti is 55 years old now.

Vashti has a transportation business in the Philippines. Vashti requested a PHP 15000 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts, and other materials needed for her business.

Vashti has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Vashti would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, and other materials needed for her business

loans.name: Gulsunai

texts.ru: Гульсунай, 56 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее среднее образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 2005 году с суммы 70,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду, Гульсунай на сегодняшний день имеет 6 коров, 15 овец. Сено и корма заготавливают сами, выращивая кукурузу, также есть фруктовый сад. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульсунай обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для откорма и последующей реализации, часть средств направит на ремонт сарая для скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Gulsunai is 56, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a secondary education.  Since 2005, she has been involved in animal husbandry, an activity which constitutes her family's main source of income.  She started her business with an initial capital of 70,000 som (KGS).  At the moment, she has six cows and 15 sheep on her farm.  Gulsunai and her family prepare hay and forage themselves from the corn that they grow.  They also have an orchard.

Eager to further grow her business, Gulsunai has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy a few steers for fattening and further resale.  She will use a portion of her loan to perform some repairs on the barn that she uses for her cattle.  Gulsunai is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further develop her farming business.

loans.use: to buy a few steers for fattening and resale, and to repair the barn she used for her livestock.

loans.name: Zhamila

texts.ru: Жамила успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог в финансировании. На сегодняшний день у нее есть корова, 15 овец и коз. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жамила вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Zhamila successfully repaid her previous loan, after using it for its intended purposed.  She is thankful to Kiva and to all the lenders who helped her obtain this financing.  At the moment, she has one cow, and 15 sheep and goats.  

In order to further expand her business, Zhamila has once again turned to Bai Tushum and she is taking a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy additional sheep for fattening and resale.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further expand her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Nurbek

texts.ru: Нурбек, 48 лет, вдовец, отец 2 детей школьного возраста. Образование- среднее, он доброжелательный, ответственный, пунктуальный и общительный. Нурбек занимается сельским хозяйством, у него есть  В хозяйстве есть 2,40 Га, где Галина выращивает фасоль и клевер для реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития  2 коровы, 5 овец, продает молоко. Ежемесячная прибыль - около 9,600 сом (KGS). Нурбек обратился в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для разведения и содержания. Доходы от кредита Нурбек планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса и ремонт сарая.
texts.en: Nurbek is 48, a widower, and he has two school-age children.  He has a secondary education and he is a friendly, responsible, punctual, and sociable man.  He works in agriculture and he has 2.4 hectares of land on which he grows beans and clover for resale.  He also has two cows and five sheep and he resells milk.  He makes a monthly income of close to 9,000 som (KGS).  He has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy calves for breeding.  He is planning to use the earnings from his loan to further grow his farming business and to repair his barn.

loans.use: to purchase some calves in order to increase his livestock headcount.

loans.name: Alejandro Adan

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 53 años de edad, casado, tiene 2 hijos vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural, en la provincia de Chiclayo, Region Lambayeque Costa Norte de Perú.

Alejandro se dedica a brindar los servicios de jornalería-fumigación, contando con herramientas propias como mochila de fumigar, palana, pico y oz; con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio, solicita préstamo para arreglos de vivienda y para mantenimiento de equipos y herramientas, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus equipos y herramientas, con gran influencia en el negocio;élcliente piensa mejorar productividad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 53 years old, married, and has two children. He lives with his family in a rural area of the Oyotun district in the Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.

Alejandro makes a living as a day laborer providing fumigation services. He uses his own tools such as a spraying backpack, shovel, pick, and scythe. He has more than ten years of experience in this business. His business is located in his own home.

He is requesting a loan for repairs on his home and for maintenance of his equipment and tools. This investment will help him to have his equipment and tools in better condition, which has a great influence on his business. He plans to improve productivity of his services and as such to be able to meet the diverse needs of customers in the region.

loans.use: to make repairs on his home and maintain equipment and work tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized metal and nails to extend the roof of the veranda and create a space to offer her services.

loans.name: Jaritza Carola

texts.es: Jaritza nació con el espíritu de ayudar a las personas que más lo necesitan es por esta razón que estudia enfermería y ya está brindando sus prácticas profesionales, siempre cuenta con el apoyo de su mama y su padrastro. Jaritza quiere seguir profesionalizándose y esta vez desea aprender inglés como segundo idioma es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para pagar un curso de inglés. Dentro de sus planes futuros desea realizar una especialidad acorde a su carrera.
texts.en:
Jaritza was born with the spirit of helping the people who need it most. For this reason, she is studying nursing, and she is already doing her professional rotations.

She always can count on the support of her mom and stepfather. Jaritza wants to continue her professional development, and this time she wants to learn English as a second language. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to pay for an English course. Her future plans include completing a specialty related to her career.

loans.use: to pay for an English course

loans.name: Mira

texts.ru: Мира, 38 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. У нее среднее образование,берется за любую работу. Занимается сельским хозяйством, торговлей продуктами питания. Благодаря упорному труду Миры и ее семьи, на данный момент в хозяйстве имеется 5 коров, 35 овец. На участке мерою 0,92 ГА выращивает картофель. В продуктовом магазине возле дома есть товар на сумму 212,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячный доход составляет примерно 31,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение ассортимента в магазине, также приобретет овец. Доходы от кредита Мира планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Mira is 38, married, and she has three children.  She has a secondary education and is happy to take any job.  She is involved in agriculture and in retail (she sells food products).  Thanks to her very hard work and to that of her family, she currently has five cows and 35 sheep on her farm.  She also grows potatoes on 0.92 hectares of land.  Mira also owns a shop close to her home and her total inventory is worth 212,000 som (KGS).  She makes approximately 31,000 som (KGS) per month.

Eager to further grow her business, Mira has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to increase her shop's inventory and also to buy a few sheep.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further expand her business.

loans.use: to buy products to sell on a retail basis in her shop, and also to purchase a few sheep.

loans.name: Maria Leticia

texts.es:
Leticia, es madre soltera, vive con sus 2 hijos, uno de ellos se dedica a la pesca y el otro se dedica a estudiar, solo el menor depende económicamente de ella. 

Leticia, se dedica a la venta de mariscos como pescados y crustáceos desde hace 10 años, fue su madre quien la indujo a este negocio y ella sale a vender de lunes a sábado en la mañana y tarde.
 
Leticia, solicita el préstamo para comprar pescado de mejor calidad, el cual es más caro pero se obtiene mayor ganancia.

Leticia, sueña con comprarle una lancha a su hijo, para que trabaje con la pesca y así pueda poner un puesto de mariscos en el mercado.
texts.en:
Leticia is a single mother and lives with her two children. One of her children is engaged in fishing, the other is a student. Only the younger child is financially dependent on her.

Leticia has made a living selling seafood such as fish and shellfish for ten years. Her mother introduced her to this business. She goes out to sell Monday through Saturday in the morning and afternoon.

Leticia is requesting a loan to buy fish of better quality. This is more expensive, but will result in higher profit.

Leticia dreams of buying a boat for her son, so that he can fish and she can put up a seafood stand in the market.

loans.use: to buy fish and shellfish of better quality.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheeting, wood, nails, and wire to improve the roof on the laundry area and corridor of the house.

loans.name: Saltanat

texts.ru: Салтанат, 59 лет, замужем, дети все взрослые и самостоятельные. У нее среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 25 овец, 3 лошади, на 2,0 Га выращивает фасоль, в огороде - огурцы, помидоры и прочие овощи для собственного потребления. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, а также на полевые работы. Доходы от кредита Салтанат планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Saltanat is 59 years old and married.  Her children are all adults and independent.  She has a secondary education and is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which help her bring an income home.  Saltanat has two cows, 25 sheep and three horses on her farm.  She also cultivates beans on two hectares of land and she has a vegetable garden in which she grows various vegetables such as cucumbers and tomatoes for the family's own consumption.  She sells milk on a daily basis.

In order to further grow her farming business, Saltanat has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy some livestock and to cultivate her land.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further develop her activity.

loans.use: to buy some livestock and to grow organic beans on her land.

loans.name: Anara

texts.ru: Анара, 34 года, замужем, 5 детей. Образование-среднее, много лет - с самого создания своей семьи, занимается сельским хозяйством. Дети Анары помогают ей по хозяйству. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 5 коров, на ежедневной основе продают экологически-чистое молоко. На 5,70 Га арендованной и 0,14 Га собственной земли выращивают кукурузу, пшеницу и ячмень для реализации и внутрихозяйственного потребления. Ежемесячный доход Анары составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Анара обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 140,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Анара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота и покупку автомобиля.
texts.en:
Anara is 34 years old, married, and she has five children.  She has a secondary education and she has been involved in agriculture ever since she started a family.  Her children help her with the farm work.  At the moment they have five cows and they sell organic milk on a daily basis.  The family also grows corn, wheat and barley on 5.7 hectares of leased land and 0.14 hectares of their own land.  They resell some of their crops and keep the rest for their own consumption.  Anara makes a monthly income of about 10,000 som (KGS).  

Anara has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 140,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock and increase the size of her herd.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her livestock headcount and to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Paula Yessenia

texts.es:
Paula, solo estudio hasta primer grado, está acompañada, vive con su pareja y sus tres hijos, los cuales estudian y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura. 

Paula, se dedica al trabajo del campo junto a su pareja, ambos trabajan la tierra desde que se casaron, pero aparte de eso, ella lava ropa ajena para obtener ingresos extras.
 
Paula, solicita el préstamo para comprar abonos y herbicidas para sus cultivos,  porque no pierde la esperanza de que el invierno sea bueno y logre obtener una buena cosecha.

Paula, sueña con tener una buena producción de granos y que sus hijos se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Paula only went to school up to the first grade. She is married and she lives with her spouse and their three children. They go to school and her spouse works in agriculture.

Paula works in the fields next to her husband. They have both worked the land since they got married. But in addition to that, she washes clothes to obtain extra income.

Paula is asking for the loan to buy fertilizer and herbicide for her crops, because she isn't losing hope that winter will be good and she will achieve a good harvest.

Paula dreams of having a good yield of grains and for her children to get an education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicide for her crops.

loans.name: Kulnara

texts.ru: Кулнара, 52 года, замужем, мама 3 детей. Образование у Кулнары средне-специальное. Работает воспитателем в Центре социальной помощи семье и детям. Около 25 лет она занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть корова, на 1,0 Га земли выращивает клевер. Ежемесячная прибыль Кулнары составляет 14,000 сом (KGS). Кулнара решила развить свою сельскохозяйственную деятельность и обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма и реализации. Доходы от бизнеса она будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие хозяйства, чтобы накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Kulnara is 52 and married with three children. She has a specialist high school education and works as a teacher in a centre of social support to families and children. She has been working in animal husbandry and agriculture as well for about 25 years. She has a cow on her farm as well as 1 hectare of land where she grows clover. Her monthly income is 14,000 KGS.

Kulnara has decided to develop her agricultural business and has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase sheep for fattening and resale. She will put profits from the business into further developing her farm, so she can save toward home renovations.

loans.use: to purchase sheep for fattening and resale

loans.name: Zenelia De Jesus

texts.es:
Zenelia, es una mujer de carácter honesto y alegre, ella ha descubierto su pasión siendo comerciante, desde hace muchos años se dedica a ser vendedora de productos de belleza de forma ambulante, madre de dos hijos que gracias a su emprendedurismo logro hacerlos convertirse en grandes profesionales. Ella se considera una mujer decidida y con muchas metas, que aun a sus cincuenta y seis años de edad, va cumpliendo poco a poco. 
En estos momentos ha recurrido a un préstamo de Kiva y MiCrédito, con el cual planea invertir y comprar nuevos productos cosméticos, de mejor calidad y prestigio, dado que su clientela así lo demanda. En un futuro desea abrir una tienda que brinde asesoría de belleza, además poder ofertar sus productos en pueblos aledaños al suyo.
texts.en:
Zenelia is a happy and honest woman who has discovered her passion as a businessperson. For many years she has worked selling beauty products door to door. She's the mother of two, and thanks to her enterprise, they have been able to become professionals. She is considered a determined woman with many goals, and even at 56 years of age she is achieving them little by little.

Currently she has turned to a loan from Kiva and MiCrédito which she plans to invest in buying new cosmetic products of higher quality and prestige, given that her clientele insists on them. In the future she would like to open a store which will offer beauty advice, and to be able to sell her products in nearby villages..

loans.use: to buy new cosmetic products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: bread for tortas (sandwiches), yuca (cassava), tomatoes, sauces, vegetables, and other products for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: brick, cement, sand, gravel and rebar to add on to his house.

loans.name: Grupo Los Saqras Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “GRUPO LOS SAQRAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Olga ella es viuda y tiene 46 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ferreteria, la socia vende clavos, pinturas y alambres, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de ferreteria.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar clavos, pinturas y alambres.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de ferreteria, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de ropa.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members are part of the communal bank "GRUPO LOS SAQRAS”. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

Olga is a member. She is a widow and is 46 years old. She has 2 children. This member works in her hardware business: she sells nails, paint and wires. She works from 8:00 am until 7:00 pm. She has been working in this business for several years, and it is going very well. Her dream is to grow her hardware business. She is requesting a loan to buy nails, paint and wires.

The other bank members work in hardware, clothing sales, grocery sales, and in the clothing business.

The member is grateful for those who are part of her dream through this program, and she promises to fulfill her loan payments on time.

loans.use: La socia solicita el crédito para comprar clavos, pinturas y alambres.

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es:
Genaro, de 64 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora, no pudo estudiar, está casada, es madre de 5 hijos, de los cuales 3 ya están casados y han formado sus propios hogares, pero viven en la misma comunidad, los otros dos ya no están con ella porque debido al conflicto armado que sufrió el país ellos fallecieron, en su casa solo vive ella, su esposo y un nieto.

Genero, tiene 15 años de tener una pequeña tienda, donde vende productos derivados de la leche (lácteos), también vende gaseosas, jugos, galletas y golosinas; la tienda está en su casa y mientras ella despacha productos en la tienda, su esposo sale a trabajar la agricultura, entre los dos se dedican a este rubro, como ella no puede ayudarle a trabajar, con una parte de la ganancia de la tienda, ella le ayuda económicamente para la compra de abonos y pago de mano de obra y en temporadas también se dedica a engordar cerdos.

Ella solicita el crédito para invertir en su tienda y tener más productos lácteos, porque muchas personas buscan y hay momentos en donde se queda sin mercadería, pero además de eso, también desea comprar otro tipo de mercadería como, arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijol y jabón para lavar trastos y ropa.

Genaro, desea mejorar su vivienda y construir un cuarto más para su nieto.
texts.en:
Genaro, who is 64 years old, is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman. She was not able to go to school. She is married and is the mother of five children, of whom three are already married and have formed their own households, but they live in the same community. The other two are not with her, because they died due to the armed conflict that the country suffered. Only she, her husband, and a grandson live in her house.

For 15 years, Genaro has had a little store where she sells dairy products. She also sells soft drinks, juices, crackers, and candies. The store is in her house, and while she sells products in the store, her husband goes out to do agricultural work. They both contribute to this activity. Because she cannot help him with the work, she helps him economically with part of the earnings from the store to purchase compost and pay for labor, and she also raises pigs seasonally.

She is applying for the loan to invest in her store and have more dairy products, because many people look for them and there are times when she is left without merchandise. But in addition to this, she also wants to buy other types of merchandise such as rice, sugar, oil, beans, dish soap, and laundry soap.

Genaro wants to improve her house and build another room for her grandson.

loans.use: to invest in her store and have more dairy products and buy rice, sugar, oil, beans, dish soap and laundry soap.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge, tiene un hijo; vive en casa propia de material noble con servicios de agua y luz. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. el distrito de Santo Tomás, está ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Jaime es la cría y venta de ganado vacuno, tiene una has. de inverna donde cría su ganado, se dedica a esta actividad hace 5 años contando con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de sus clientes. También cultiva café variedad catimor. El destino del crédito será para la compra de ganado y sanidad del mismo, con ello obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jaime is 37 years old. He lives with his wife and has a son. He lives in his own house made of quality materials with running water and electricity. His community is basically dedicated to agriculture, livestock raising, and commerce. The district of Santo Tomás is located in the province of Cutervo, in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru.

Jaime's work is raising and selling cattle. He has a hectare of pasture where he raises his livestock. He has been doing this work for five years, having experience in this business and good references from his customers. He also raises Catimor variety coffee. The purpose of the loan will be for the purchase of cattle and to maintain their health. With this, he will obtain better income so that he can improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy cattle and maintain their health

loans.name: Danny

texts.en:
Danny started thinking about opening a business years ago when he began having children. In 2014 he finally opened his business and is proud to finally be developing a legacy for his family.

Danny’s business involves working with computers, understanding networks and how they work in relation to the passage of information. Growing up, he was always interested in computers and playing with things to see how they work. In addition to enjoying tinkering with computer parts and problem solving, Danny also likes being part of an ever-changing computer technology market that requires the need to consistently learn more.

Danny’s greatest success in running his business so far has been the opportunity he has had to service companies such as ToysRUs, Mimecast and LinkedIn. His biggest difficulty, however, has been not being able to get access to the materials he needs in time to complete particular jobs.

Danny is currently seeking a loan to acquire the tools he needs to successfully complete the jobs he is hoping to be contracted for. His vision for the future is to successfully grow his company for his four boys and their future families.

loans.use: to purchase additional tools and materials.

loans.name: Jason

texts.en:
Jason started Type:Freedom as a means to offer a service to the diabetic community that currently does not exist. Living with Type-1 Diabetes, Jason has been turning challenges into triumphs for over 20 years. At one point, Jason realized that he had something to share, something that served others, and something that is actually needed in the diabetic community. Now, he wants to offer that knowledge, expertise, and dedication to share how to master diabetes.

Currently, he is the only health coach for Type:Freedom, but his vision expands far beyond a one-person team. Eventually, he wants to have a full team of Type:Freedom coaches serving the diabetic community. Not only will this help people improve their health and lives, but it will spark a greater conversation of health and wellness and create the opportunity for people to connect with others, authentically and powerfully.

The Kiva loan will help Jason create an exceptionally aesthetic website with strong advertising. This will enable Type: Freedom to have top visibility for those looking for “diabetes lifestyle coaching.”

loans.use: to pay for the development of his website.

loans.name: Elkin Enrique

texts.es: Elkin es un emprendedor hombre de 33 años de edad que ante la dificultad que presentaba porque su salario no era suficiente para suplir todas las necesidades de su familia, decidió buscar alternativas para generar ingresos adicionales y consideró que la venta de mercancías varias sería la ideal.  Hoy en día cuenta con años comercializando a sus vecinos, amigos y familiares, prendas de vestir, calzado y accesorio a excelentes precios y con facilidad de pago.  Él vende sobre pedidos que le realizan sus clientes y para responder oportunamente a estos requerimientos está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en la compra de camisetas, pantalones, zapatos y variedades.  Con esta inversión logrará obtener utilidades para el sustento de su familia conformada por su cónyuge y dos hijos menores de edad.  Su meta a futuro es fortalecer su capital de trabajo y educar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elkin is an entrepreneurial man of 33 who, in the face of the difficulty presented to him because his salary wasn't sufficient to supply all the necessities of his family, decided to seek alternatives for generating additional income, and he judged that the sale of varied merchandise would be ideal.

Now he has years [of experience] selling to his neighbors, friends, and relatives. He sells articles of clothing, footwear, and accessories at excellent prices and with payment plans. He sells through orders that his customers place, and to respond in a timely way to these requests, he is applying for his first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. He will invest the loan in the purchase of  t-shirts, pants, shoes, and other items. 

With this investment, he will succeed in obtaining profits for the sustenance of his family, which is formed by his wife and two minor children. His goal for the future is to strengthen his working capital and educate his children.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, pants, shoes, and other items

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 50 pairs of shoes for sale.

loans.name: Blanca Doris

texts.en:
Blanca is 43 years old and is a married woman. She lives in the municipality of El Carmen de Viboral with her husband and two sons. A time ago the family was going through a bad economic situation. Blanca saw herself obligated to do something, so she started a farm where she grows different kind of products, and this business has helped a lot for her family which now has a better quality of life.

Now this mother wants to go further with her business, so she wants to increase her growing, and with that, she expects that the sales can improve too. She needs some money so she can invest enough because she wants to go big so her business can be successful.

She asked for a loan so she can buy many hydrangea cuttings, because she wants to specialize in these beautiful flowers.

Blanca wants to pay for her children's education because she believes with education her sons can be better people in the future. She also wants to improve the conditions of her house. You can help Blanca to be closer to her goals, and a loan will do that.

loans.use: to buy many hydrangea cuttings.

loans.name: Félicité

texts.fr: Félicité est une femme mariée âgée de 41 ans résidant à Tokoin. Ayant cinq enfants à charge, Félicité  est une commerçante des céréales qui s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile.  Félicité demande ce crédit pour commander des petits sacs de riz, des sacs de maïs et des bols du haricot en vue de faire des bénéfices et aider son mari à bien s’occuper de leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Félicité is forty-one years old, married and lives in Tokoin. She is responsible for five children.

Félicité sells cereals from the front of her house. She buys her stock once a month from the market. She has requested this loan to order small bags of rice, sacks of maize and bowls of beans. She hopes this will generate a profit which will help her husband take good care of their children.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of maize, 22 small sacks of rice and 20 bowls of beans.

loans.name: Daysi Susana

texts.es:
Daysi, se dedica a vender tortillas y comida, negocio que fue fundado hace cinco años, ya es muy reconocida en la zona donde reside; actualmente vive con su esposo quien tiene una actividad económica diferente, aún no tiene hijos y no cuenta con ayuda familiar del extranjero.
Solicita un crédito para comprar maíz, arroz, frijol y leña parar tener en su inventario ingredientes básicos para preparar la venta de tortillas y comida, su objetivo es satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
Su visión es tener una imagen intachable en su comunidad y apoyar en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Daysi earns a living selling tortillas and food, a business that was started five years ago. It's now very well-known in the area she lives in.

She currently lives with her husband, who is in a different line of work because they don't have children and don't have outside family help.

She's seeking a loan to buy corn, rice, beans and firewood to have basic ingredients in her inventory for preparing tortillas and food for sale. Her goal is to satisfy her customers' needs.

Her vision is to have a sterling reputation in her community and support family expenses.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, beans and firewood to have basic ingredients in her inventory for preparing tortillas and food for sale.

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr: Agée de 33 ans, Kossiwa est une femme mariée et mère de deux enfants vivant ensemble à Tokoin. Pour soutenir sa famille, Kossiwa vend des produits de beauté en circulant dans les quartiers et s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Kossiwa réalise sa rentabilité dans son activité et pour bien satisfaire aux besoins de ses clients, Kossiwa désire ce prêt pour commander des douzaines de vernis, de l’eau de vernis et des pieds de biches d’agrandir son stock et aider son mari à couvrir les charges du ménage.
texts.en:
Kossiwa is thirty-three years old, married and mother to two children. They all live together in Tokoin. In order to support her family, Kossiwa sells beauty products on foot in various neighbourhoods. She buys her supplies twice a month at the market.

Kossiwa's business is profitable but to satisfy the needs of her customers she has requested this loan. It will increase her stocks of nail varnish, nail varnish remover and sewing machine spare parts. This will help her husband pay for the costs of their household.

loans.use: to buy 10 dozen bottles of nail varnish, 6 dozen bottles of nail varnish remover and 10 dozen pieces of sewing machine parts.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.es:
El señor Virgilio de 68  años de edad,  no tiene hijos que dependen de él, vive con su esposa, en su propia casa en una comunidad de  San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 17 años  al negocio de venta de frescos y dulces y sus clientes son los amigos y personas de su comunidad.
Don Virgilio es una persona trabajadora y con deseos de salir adelante, está solicitando el préstamo para la legalización de una propiedad donde está ubicado su negocio, con el apoyo de este préstamo espera cumplir su sueño que es legalizar su propiedad y poder mejorar su calidad  es un cliente ya de varios ciclos de trabajar con Prisma.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - Julio del 2015.
texts.en:
Virgilio is 68 years old and doesn't have children who depend on him. He lives with his wife in their own house in the community of San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras.

For 17 years, he's earned a living selling fresh items and sweets. His customers are his friends and people from his community.

Virgilio is a hardworking person with a desire to get ahead and is seeking the loan to get legal title to the land his business is located on. With the support of this loan, he hopes to achieve his dream, which is to have title to the land and be able to improve his quality. He's already been a client of Prisma in various work cycles.

loans.use: to receive title for the land where he has his business.

loans.name: Silvia Maria

texts.en:
Silvia is 44 years old and lives in the municipality of Rionegro, which is near Medellín. She is a widow with a son, but she has found the way to go through life giving to her child the best she can. She’s a hero in her son’s eyes, and for a good reason. Now she wants to go a little further and be more independent and she’s willing to create her own business selling clothes.

She sees her business being successful and recognized. She’s aware that she has to work really hard to accomplish that and she’s willing to do so. She asked for a loan so she can buy inputs like clothes and shoes, so she can start with a good amount of products.

She dreams of buying a house for her and her son, so they can live comfortably and safely. She also wants to open her own place where she can offer her products. You can help Silvia to achieve her goals; a loan maybe being the first step for that.

loans.use: to buy inputs like clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Fabian

texts.es:
Fabián, es un señor de cincuenta y siete años de edad, que ama el aire fresco del campo y las grandes parcelas de tierra verdes. Él tiene treinta y cinco años de ser agricultor y granjero, es decir siembra maíz y frijoles, además ha ido adquiriendo ganado. Es el pilar de su hogar, padre de dos adolescentes, los cuales le ayudan en la siembra cuando regresan del colegio.
En estos momentos, Fabián, recurre de la ayuda de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para comprar insumos como pesticidas, abono y vitaminas para las siembras. Además de comida para el ganado. En un futuro el desea distribuir su producto a algún supermercado importante del país, además de ver a sus hijos graduados de la universidad. Su familia es su principal motor de energías.
texts.en:
Fabián is a 57 year old man who loves the fresh air in the fields and big stretches of green land. He's been a farmer and rancher for 35 years, meaning he grows corn and beans and has also acquired some livestock.

He is the pillar of his home and the father of two teenagers who help him with the crop when they return from high school.

Right now, Fabián needs help from Kiva together with MiCrédito to buy inputs like pesticides, compost and vitamins for his crops, as well as food for livestock.

In the future, he wants to distribute his product to an important supermarket in the country and see his children graduate from university. His family is his main driver of energy.

loans.use: to buy inputs like pesticides, compost and vitamins for his crops.

loans.name: Pedro Nolasco

texts.en:
Pedro is 47 years old and lives in the municipality of Valencia, with his partner and his beautiful 7-year-old daughter, the motor of his life like he likes to call her. In 1995 he started an agricultural production business thanks to his love for farm activities. Now he works with a family member seven days a week.

He wants to see his business grow and improve, but he’s aware that to accomplish that he has to invest in it, and right now he doesn’t have the capital to do so. That’s why he’s asking for a loan so he can buy some agricultural inputs and get some technical assistance for his growing. He believes with that he can increase his profits.

For Pedro, his daughter and his wife are the most important things in his life. That’s the reason why he dreams of paying for his daughter's education so she can have success in life. You can help Pedro with a loan and get him closer to achieve all his goals.

loans.use: to buy some agricultural inputs and get some technical assistance for his growing.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela tien 52 años de edad, soltera, tiene 1 hijo, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural, de la provincia de chiclayo, Region Lambayeque, Costa Norte de peru. Es una comunidad dedicada al comercio, ganaderia y agricultura mayormente.

Daniela se dedica a brindar los servicios de jornalería, contando con herramientas propias como mochila de fumigar, palana, pico y oz; con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio, solicita préstamo para arreglos de vivienda y para mantenimiento de equipos y herramientas, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus equipos y herramientas, con gran influencia en el negocio; ella piensa mejorar productividad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Daniela is 52 years old, single, and has one son. She lives with her family in the Oyotún district, which is a rural area in the Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru. It is a community focused mainly on livestock and agriculture. 

Daniela works as a day laborer and has her own tools, such as a fumigation backpack, shovel, pick, and scythe. She has more than ten years of experience in this business, which she runs from her home. 

She is asking for the loan for home repairs and maintenance of her equipment and tools. This investment will help her keep her tools and equipment in better condition, which will have a great impact on her business. 

She plans on improving the productivity of her services and thus being able to respond to the various needs of customers in her area.

loans.use: to maintain her work tools.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
La señora María de 64  años de edad, vive con su esposo y su hija que no depende de ella en su casa propia,  se dedica desde hace 06  años al negocio de venta de ropa usada, vive en San Lorenzo en la zona sur de Honduras,  es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña María está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de pantalones, camisas, chores, bóxer, licras, camisetas, vestidos, faldas, etc. y de esta manera tener la mercadería necesaria para satisfacer a sus clientes, con el apoyo de este prestamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo  con deseos de trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Julio del  2015.
texts.en:
Maria is 64 years old and lives with her husband and daughter who doesn't depend on her in their own house. For six years, she's earned a living selling used clothes.

She lives in San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras. She's a hardworking woman with a desire to get ahead and strives day after day to improve her quality of life.

Maria is seeking a loan to buy to buy pants, shirts, shorts, boxers, tights, tops, dresses, skirts, etc. and thus have the merchandise necessary to satisfy her customers. With the support of this loan she'll be able to improve her income and also her quality of life. She's a new customer who hopes to work with Prisma.

Her dream is to have a good business and increase her customers while also improving her future together with her family's.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, shorts, boxers, tights, tops, dresses, skirts, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Raul Antonio

texts.en:
Raúl is 58 years old and lives in the municipality of Sahagun. For a while he’s being thinking about creating his own business, because he has some economic needs that he’s looking to solve. He has a great talent, making food, something that he does really well and loves to do.

He doesn’t have the money to start his own business. That’s the reason why he’s asking for a loan, so he can start his business and can buy some inputs and disposables. He wants to offer a great and big menu, and also wants to see his business last in time.

He dreams of someday being able to open his own restaurant and to create employment for people that like him want to improve their lives. He also wants to improve his house that is not in the best condition. You can help Raúl to accomplish all his dreams with a loan.

loans.use: to buy some inputs and disposables.

loans.name: Maria Betty

texts.es:
María, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a la  agricultura, tienen cuatro hijos, dos de ellos tienen sus propios hogares aparte y dos viven con ella y estudian.

María, se ha dedica a la agricultura desde hace 28 años, todo lo que sabe lo aprendió de sus padres, quienes desde muy pequeña le enseñaron.- Para desempeñar su trabajo recorre 2 kilómetros diarios aproximadamente y su horario de trabajo es de 5 horas al día. 

María, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono y herbicidas para cultivar maíz esto le permitirá cosechar la agricultura y asegurar la alimentación de su familia.

María, sueña con ver a su hijo estudiar y ayudarlo en lo que puedan para mejorar los ingresos de la familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 45 and studied until third grade. She's partnered, and her partner works in agriculture. They have four children, two of whom have their own separate homes and two live with her and study.

Maria has been working in agriculture for 28 years and learned everything she knows from her parents, who taught her from a very young age. To perform her work, she walks about two kilometers daily and works five hours per day.

Maria needs the loan to buy agricultural inputs like compost and herbicides to grow corn. This will allow her to harvest the crop and ensure her family is fed. Maria dreams of seeing her son in school and helping him with what she can to improve the family's income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like compost and herbicides to grow corn.

loans.name: Luis Francisco

texts.en:
Luis is 54 years old and lives in the municipality of Sahagun with his two children, one daughter who is 10 years old and one son who is 8 years old. His mother always educated him to be independent and to work hard for his family, something that he not only does, but believes with all his heart is the best way to make his family happy.

Right now the family is going through rough times and that’s the reason why Luis wants to start his own business. He’s going to begin to raise livestock, so he’s asking for a loan so he can buy some pigs, food for them and a to build a pigsty. He hopes his business can have a lot of clients and can give him good profits.

Luis dreams of paying for his children's education, something he believes can do a lot of good for their future. He also wants to improve his house because it has some problems. You can help Luis to accomplish all his dreams. A loan will do a lot for him.

loans.use: to buy some pigs, food for them and a to build a pigsty.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To pay for essentials and so she has started a new business selling tamales and a special Guatemalan treat called a “chuchito”.

loans.name: Pedro Paulo

texts.es: Pedro es un hombre muy fuerte y trabajador, él tiene veintiún años siendo comerciante de materiales de construcción, su materia prima en su negocio es su propio camión en el que moviliza. Con este trabajo, tiene que pasar mucho tiempo fuera de casa, sin embargo es un padre responsable. Este honesto hombre, ha recurrido a un financiamiento, con el cual piensa comprar bloques, cemento y piedrilla. En futuro planea ofrecer su producto por todo el país, además construir su casa y ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. También seguir apoyándose en financiamientos de kiva junto a MiCrédito.
texts.en:
Pedro is a very strong, hard working man. He has worked trading construction materials for twenty-one years, and the most important resource for his business is his truck in which he travels around. With this work he has to spend lots of time away from home, but nevertheless he is a responsible father.
This honest man has resorted to a loan, with which he plans to buy cinder blocks, cement and gravel. In the future he plans to offer his products across the whole country, as well as constructing his house and offering his family a better quality of life by continuing to support himself through Kiva loans together with MiCrédito.

loans.use: to buy cinder blocks, cement and gravel.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora María de 61  años de edad, vive con sus hijos  en su casa propia,  se dedica desde hace 10 años al negocio de venta de abarrotería, en su negocio vende todo lo relacionada a la canasta básica también elabora rosquillas 2 veces por semana, vive en una aldea de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras.
Doña María es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida, está solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos para surtir la pulpería como arroz, azúcar, manteca, huevos, jabón, papel higiénico, pan, churros, frescos, jugos, pollo, etc. espera que esta inversión le permita salir adelante con su negocio y obtener las ganancias necesarias para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, es una clienta subsiguiente  con deseos de seguir trabajando con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio, bien surtido.
texts.en:
Maria is 61 years old and lives with her children in a house that she owns. For 10 years Maria has made a living running a grocery store. There she sells all sorts of staple goods, while also producing "rosquillas" (sweet pastries) twice a week. Maria lives in a village in San Lorenzo, in southern Honduras.

Maria is enterprising and wants to get ahead. She works hard every day in order to improve her quality of life. Maria is applying for a loan in order to stock up her grocery store with products such as rice, sugar, butter, eggs, soap, toilet roll, bread, churros, soft drinks, fruit juices, chicken and more. She hopes that this investment will allow her to move forward with her business and to earn the necessary profit to improve her and her family's quality of life. Maria is a repeat borrower with a desire to continue working with Prisma Honduras.

Her dream is to have a good, well-stocked business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, butter, eggs, soap, toilet roll, bread, churros, soft drinks, fruit juices, chicken and more for her business.

loans.name: Psyche Lendee

texts.en: Psyche Lendee is a 19-year-old college undergraduate who lives in Valladolid, Negros Occidental. She is married to Gerald, a tricycle driver. They have two children ages two and one. Their total monthly family income is only PHP 7,000 ($152), which is not enough to provide even their family’s basic needs. Thus, when Psyche Lendee qualified for the two-month training program of Bagosphere, she found hope that there’s actually a chance for her to uplift her family’s life in just a few months. Your loan assistance may pave the way for this young mother to land a successful career in the BPO industry, and thereby give a better future to her growing children.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a two-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly.

loans.name: Maura Yulieth

texts.es: Maura es una mujer de 25 años de edad que encontró la manera de crecer comercialmente a través de la comercialización de detergentes y desinfectantes de uso doméstico y la elaboración de pasabocas congelados que ofrece a los pobladores del municipio de Arjona. Ella ha logrado consolidar un gran número de clientes en sus años de funcionamiento, en su gran mayoría son amigos, vecinos, familiares y referidos y su cadena de comercialización es a través de pedidos que atiende todos los días. Lo que más le gusta a Maura de su trabajo es que puede compartir con sus tres hijos menores de edad y cumplir a cabalidad con todos sus deberes en el hogar.  Actualmente está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará los ingredientes necesarios para elaborar los pasabocas; harina, vitina, queso, mantequilla, aceite, bandejas desechables y plástico para empacar. Su meta a futuro es adquirir una maquina sobadora para amasar la masa y hacer sus productos con más facilidad y acortar sus tiempos de producción.
texts.en:
Maura is 25 years old and has found a way to grow professionally: she sells detergents and disinfectants for use at home, and produces frozen snacks to sell to inhabitants of the municipality of Arjona.

Maura has managed to gain many customers during the years that her business has existed. The majority are friends, neighbours, relatives and people come following recommendations. Maura serves customers every day and fulfills their orders.

What Maura most likes about her job is that she can spend time with her three children, all under the age of 18, and carry out her household chores at the same time.

Maura is applying for a loan from Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo in order to buy the necessary products for making and selling snacks, including flour, cheese, butter, oil, disposable trays, plastic for packing goods and display cases.

Maura's future goal is to buy a food mixer in order to mix the dough and make her products more easily and quickly.

loans.use: to buy flour, cheese, butter, oil, disposable trays, plastic for packing goods and display cases.

loans.name: Dexter

texts.en: Dexter is a 21-year-old college undergraduate who lives in Himamaylan City. He belongs to a family of six. His father has passed away, leaving his mother, a food vendor, to be the breadwinner. Dexter is the second to the youngest in the family. His elder sister works in a computer shop in Manila, while his younger brother is in elementary level. The family’s total monthly income of PHP 8,800 ($191) is barely enough to provide their basic needs. This motivated Dexter to find a means to help the family have more income. Dexter braved the selection process of Bagosphere and successfully passed it to qualify for the two-month training program that could lead to a call center job. Apart from helping his family, Dexter also dreams of being a successful call center agent and eventually, to finish his college degree. Your generosity in funding his loan can become a great foundation for Dexter to build his life on.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a two-month call center training program that can get him a job paying about $270 monthly.

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.en:
Ermelinda is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 46 years old and has three children who are in school.

Ermelinda has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Ermelinda has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Arlina

texts.en:
Arlina is 44 years old and has two children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Arlina is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Arlina has been raising pigs for eight years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Arlina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Rosanie

texts.en:
Rosanie is 32 years old and has six children. She is married and has five children who are in school.

Rosanie is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

She has been raising livestock for two years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosanie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Jerose

texts.en:
Jerose is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jerose is 33 years old and both of her children are in school.

Jerose has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more vegetables to sell.

Jerose has been in this business for two years. In the future, Jerose would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy is 43 years old and married with five children. With all five children in school, Mary Joy works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Joy has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Mary Joy has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, canned goods and other personal care products.

In the future, Mary Joy would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Aires

texts.en: A $1,000 loan is being offered to Aires to repair his house. He is married and he has five children. He is taking the loan to buy cement, sand, wood, stone and other materials. He is very happy because TRM offered a loan to him to repair his house for all the family. Aires is a teacher and his wife is a midwife.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, wood, stone and other materials.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Avelina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 47 years old and has two children who are in school.

Avelina has a manicure and pedicure business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items to sell like nail polish, nail cutters, etc.

Avelina has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like nail polish, nail cutters, etc.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 34 years old and has two children who are in school.

Mary Jane has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Mary Jane has been in this business for seven years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Las Hormigas Group

texts.es:
El estado de Oaxaca cuenta con comunidades de trascendencia histórica muy importante. Los destinos turísticos que ofrece son variados y de una riqueza cultural sobresaliente debido a las raíces prehispánicas que se fusionaron con las del nuevo mundo. La vida de dichas comunidades sigue siendo tradicional e incluso algunas conservan la lengua de sus antepasados. 
   El grupo Las Hormigas es originario de la región antes mencionada y llevan tal nombre porque, al igual que los pequeños insectos, todos los integrantes trabajan en equipo para lograr sus metas. Ellos son: Verónica y Carmen quienes venden calzado por catálogo; Yolanda, tamales; Danaides, tacos; Eliazar, pollo y Lorenzo quien da servicio de herrería. 
   Don Lorenzo es un hombre trabajador y comprometido con su familia integrada por su esposa Rosaura y 3 hijos los cuales son mayores de edad actualmente. Lencho, como le conocen sus amigos, dedicó gran parte de su vida a trabajar en la siembra de caña de azúcar, frijol y maíz, también a la pesca y venta de pez mojarra todo esto con el objetivo de solventar los gastos para la educación de sus hijos.
   No obstante, desde hace 7 años comenzó a brindar servicios de herrería; oficio que aprendió de un amigo con el cual se asoció. Gradualmente pudo comprar una máquina para soldar, pinzas, desarmadores, cortadora, segueta y soldadura con lo que dio inicio a su propio taller. En una libreta bosqueja las medidas, el material requerido y la fecha de entrega para poder cumplir en tiempo y forma  a cada uno de sus clientes. Uno de sus hijos está interesado en la actividad así pues le ayuda a medir, cortar y pintar las estructuras que previamente su padre diseñó. 
   En esta ocasión solicita un préstamo para comprar soldadura, una careta y 3 ángulos  indispensables para crear una repisa. “Me gusta mi actividad pues genero ingresos para solventar los gastos de mi familia y además paso tiempo con ellos” comenta con una gran sonrisa. 
   El grupo agradece a VF México y KIVA por la gran oportunidad que les brinda para poder cambiar su vida de manera favorable.
*Ellos son los integrantes del grupo Las Hormigas, Don Lencho es quien viste playera color verde.
texts.en:
The state of Oaxaca has important communities with historical significance. The tourist destinations that it offers are various and from an outstanding cultural richness from the pre-Hispanic roots that merged with those from the new world. The life of said communities continues being traditional and some still maintain the language of their ancestors.

"Las Hormigas (The Ants)" group is from the region previously mentioned and they have this name because, just like the small insects, all of the members work in a team to reach their goals. They are: Verónica and Carmen, who sell shoes from a catalog; Yolanda, who sells tamales; Danaides, who sells tacos; Eliazar, who sells chicken; and Lorenzo, who serves as a blacksmith.

Lorenzo is a hard-working and dedicated man to his family, composed of his wife, Rosaura, and 3 children who are now adults. Lencho, as his friends call him, dedicated a large part of his life to planting sugar cane, beans, and corn, as well as fishing and selling crappie fish. He did all of this in order to cover his children's educational expenses.

However, 7 years ago he started to give his services as a blacksmith. He learned this job from a friend with whom he is associated. Gradually, he was able to buy a soldering machine, pliers, screwdrivers, a cutter blade, hacksaw and solder, and he started his own repair shop. The measurements, necessary materials and the delivery date are outlined in a book to be able to comply with each one of his customers in a timely manner. One of the sons is interested in the job, so he helps him to measure, cut and paint the structures that his father previously designed.

This time, he is asking for a loan to buy solder, a mask and 3 indispensable angles to make a shelf. "I like my job because I get an income to cover my family's expenses and I can spend time with them," he says with a big smile.

The group thanks VF México and KIVA for the great opportunity that they are giving them to be able to favorably change their lives.

*These are the members of the Las Hormigas group. Lencho is wearing a green t-shirt.

loans.use: to buy solder, a mask and three 1/2 angles.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, nunca fue a la escuela, está soltera y vive con sus 2 hijas, una de ellas trabaja y la otra estudia, en su casa también vive su pequeño nieto.

María, se dedica a la venta de empanadas de plátanos desde hace más de 25 años y fue su madre quien desde pequeña le enseño a hacerlas y a ejercer este negocio; pero además de eso, también hace tortillas para vender.

María, solicita el préstamo para poder construir una galera para evitar asolearse y estar más cómoda en el lugar donde vender; también necesita el préstamo para comprar ingredientes para elaborar las empanadas.

María, sueña con tener un gran negocio y a futuro poder tener dos puesto de tortillas; una para ella y el otro para la hija.
texts.en:
Maria never went to school, she is single and lives with her 2 children. One of them works and the other one studies, he young nephew also lives in her house. 

Maria has earned a living selling banana empanadas for more than 25 years, it was her mother who taught her how to do it 
and how to run this business when she was little. On top of this she also makes tortillas to sell. 

Maria is asking for the loan to be able to build a kitchen to avoid being in the sun all day and to be more comfortable in her place of work. She also needs the loan to buy ingredients to make the empanadas. 

Maria dreams of having a big business and a future with two places to make tortilla, one for her and one for her daughter.

loans.use: to be able to build a kitchen to avoid being in the sun too much and to buy ingredients to make empanadas

loans.name: Calixta

texts.en:
Calixta is 63 years old and has four children. She is a married woman.

Calixta is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Calixta requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Calixta has been raising pigs for 18 years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Calixta would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 50 years old and married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Merlinda has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Merlinda has been in this business for two years. In the future, Merlinda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Cartina

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Cartina works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of used shoes business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store. Cartina is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy sacks of used shoes to sell for her buy and sell of used shoes business.

Cartina has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy sacks of used shoes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, and sheet metal to build a corridor in her home, which will also improve her business.

loans.name: Maria Yamileth

texts.es:
La señora María Yamileth de 37 años de edad, vive con su esposo tiene hijos que dependen de ambos vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 17 años a la venta de abarrotería.
Doña María también se dedica a la venta de pescado blanco y rojo es una mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante, está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de arroz, café, azúcar, frijoles, huevos, harina, pan, etc. productos  que necesita para surtir su negocio ya que desea ampliarlo y con las ganancias ir mejorando su calidad de vida, mantuvo un crédito anteriormente con Prisma.
Uno de sus sueños es mejorar su casa. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Julio de 2015.
texts.en:
María Yamileth is 37 years old. She lives with her husband and has children who depend on them. She lives in a community of San Lorenzo, in the southern valley of Honduras. She has her own home and has had a grocery store for 17 years. María also sells white and red fish.

She is a hard-working woman with desires to get ahead. She is asking for a loan to buy rice, coffee, sugar, beans, eggs, flour, bread, etc. These are products that she needs to supply her business because she wants to broaden it and with the earnings improve her quality of life. She had a previous loan through Prisma.

One of her goals is to improve her house.



San Lorenzo, Honduras - Julio de 2015.

loans.use: to buy rice, coffee, sugar, beans, eggs, flour, bread, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Isidra

texts.es:
Isidra, es una señora de cincuenta y siete años de edad, que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a trabajar duro para sacar a su familia adelante, ella tiene un negocio de echar tortillas. Ha logrado crecer notablemente como comerciante, porque pudo suplir las necesidades que su negocio tenia. 
Ella solicita un financiamiento, esta vez a utilizarlo en la compra de maíz, porque dada la cambiante situación del clima en la zona donde ella vive, el precio de este ha aumentado y lo mejor es comprar por mayor, así su negocio no se detiene y sigue produciendo. En un futuro planea incursionar en una pulpería.
texts.en:
Isidra is a 57 year old woman, who has dedicated a large part of her life to working hard to support her family. She has a business making tortillas. She has managed to grow noticeably as a businesswoman because she could supply the necessities of her business.

She is asking for a loan, this time to use to buy corn. Due to the changing climate situation in the area where she lives, the price of corn has increased and it is best to buy it wholesale. This is so her business doesn't stop and it keeps producing. In the future, she plans to venture into a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Yuranis Paola

texts.es: Yuranis reside en compañía de su cónyuge y dos pequeños hijos en una vivienda ubicada en la población de Arjona localidad en donde se consolida su clientela. Ella es una comerciante de 23 años que a través de guías especializadas de productos o catálogos promueve la venta de artículos para el cuidado personal, esta emprendedora recibió la propuesta para incorporarse a este estilo de comercialización gracias a una amiga y desde entonces ha obtenido multiplex beneficios económicos para su grupo familiar. En dos puntos del municipio diariamente vende minutos a celular otro ingreso de su polifuncional labor comercial y en la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará productos de Belleza que surte a sus clientes y realiza sus cobros semanalmente.  Hoy en día cuenta con dos años de experiencia y su meta a largo plazo es continuar en el comercio para seguir ofreciendo bienestar a su familia y lograr comprar su casa propia.
texts.en:
Yuranis lives with her partner and two small children in a home located in the population of Arjona, the place where she consolidates her clientele. She is a 23 year old merchant who, through specialized product guides or catalogs, promotes the sale of personal care products. This entrepreneur was approached to join this style of marketing thanks to a friend and since then she has obtained multiple economic benefits for her family.

In two parts of the town, on a daily basis, she sells cell phone minutes which is another income from her multi-purpose commercial work. She is currently applying for a CrediKiva, which is the first funding she has asked for through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. Through this, she will buy beauty products to supply her customers and make her weekly collections. She now has 2 years of experience and her long-term goal is to continue with the business to keep offering wellbeing to her family and to buy her own home.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: German

texts.es: German es un hombre trabajador de 32 años de edad que se dedica desde hace 14 años a realizar la venta de pan francés en su comunidad y en las comunidades vecinas, donde es muy reconocido por ser responsable y trabajador. German vive en casa de su propiedad junto a sus 2 hijos de 13 y 17 años de edad a los que está sacando adelante el solo ya que no cuenta con más apoyo que su trabajo su esfuerzo es mayor. German desea construir un cuarto en su propiedad ya que su vivienda que está hecha de adobe es bastante pequeña, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo, arena, grava, cemento y hierro para construir un cuarto en su propiedad y brindar mayor seguridad a sus hijos.
texts.en: German is a hardworking 32 year old man. For 14 years, he has sold french bread in his community and in the nearby communities. He is known for being responsible and hardworking. German lives in a home he owns with his two children, aged 13 and 17. He is getting them ahead alone because he has no help, and so he works very hard. German wants to build a room on his property, because his house is very small. He is asking for a loan from  FUSAI to invest in brick, sand, gravel, cement and iron to build a room on his property and offer more security to his children.

loans.use: to invest in brick, sand, gravel, cement and iron to build a room on his property and offer more security to his children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, and iron to build a room onto her house to offer better comfort for her family.

loans.name: Ninna

texts.es:
Ninna, es estudiante de marketing en una universidad privada, trabaja en un laboratorio de diseño gráfico para publicidades, a la vez que trabaja también está estudiando y lucha por poder ser alguien en la vida.
Una vez terminada la carrera quiere conseguir un trabajo donde pueda trabajar en lo que ella estudia y ayudara profesionalmente a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar sus libros del semestre, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda para poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Ninna is a marketing student at a private university. She works in a graphic design laboratory for ads. While she is working she also goes to school and fights to become someone in life.

One she gets her degree she wants to get a job in her field and help her family professionally.

She is asking for the loan to be able to buy her bools for the semester. This will really help her continue her education.

loans.use: to buy books for the semester.

loans.name: Guido

texts.es:
Guido continua con sus estudios de enfermería, es una persona que quiere ser alguien por medio de sus estudios, es por ello que esta poniendo todo de si para poder lograrlo, se esta esforzando para poder cumplir con su anhelo, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en comprar útiles para su universidad.
Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Guido continues with his Nursing degree. He is a person who wants to be someone through his education. For that reason, he is giving his all to be able to achieve that. He is striving to be able to fulfill his desire. He says that with the previous loan, he used it to buy tools for his college. Today he is asking for a new loan to be able to pay his college fees and thus be able to continue with his studies like he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay his college fees.

loans.name: Las Delicias Group

texts.es:
El grupo Las Delicias es originario de una región que se ha visto favorecida por el cauce de los ríos Estanzuela, Moreno, Hondo y el Amapa que divide a los estados de Veracruz y Oaxaca. Durante temporadas de sequía y en la Semana Santa las familias de los poblados cercanos se dan cita en dichos ríos para disfrutar de sus refrescantes aguas.
   Los integrantes del grupo son: Rosalía quien vende comida típica; Margarita y Margarita L., cosméticos; María E., abarrotes; Alberto, tacos. Por su lado Rafael repara equipos celulares y María C. maneja un hotel. 
   Doña Rosalía es un ejemplo de éxito al hacerse cargo de su hijo sin la ayuda de nadie más; él actualmente es mayor de edad y juntos solventan los gastos de su hogar. Doña Chaila, como le llaman de cariño, decidió comenzar un negocio de comida típica desde hace más de siete años para lo cual acondicionó el patio de su casa con mesas, sillas y una pequeña cocina. Todos los días los clientes se dan cita a partir de las seis de la tarde para disfrutar platillos realizados con una sazón única y una atención incomparable. 
   Gracias a las ganancias obtenidas logró comprar un anafre, un comal y tanques de gas puesto que es el material que más utiliza en su labor. De igual manera remodeló su casa y puede hacer frente a sus gastos personales. Por otro lado, para ella el préstamo que VFMéxico le ofrece significa un cambio favorable para su negocio ya que invertiría en la compra de carne, refresco, gas y platos; “trabajare arduamente para poder hacer realidad mis sueños” comenta con entusiasmo.
   El grupo Las Delicias agradece a todo el 	equipo de KIVA por los beneficios que incrementan la productividad de sus actividades. 
* La fotografía fue tomada en el negocio de Doña Chalia quien viste blusa verde.
texts.en:
The group "Las Delicias (The Delights)" originated in a region that has been favored for its rivers, Estanzuela, Moreno, Hondo and Amapa, which divide the states of Veracruz and Oaxaca. During the times of drought and throughout Easter, the families from the nearby towns come together at these rivers to enjoy the refreshing water. The members of the group are: Rosalía, who sells traditional food; Margarita and Margarita L., who sell cosmetics; María E., who has a grocery store; and Alberto, who sells tacos. On the side, Rafael repairs handsets and María C. manages a hotel.

Rosalía is an example of success by taking care of her child without anyone else's help. He is now an adult and they cover the household expenses together. Chalia, as they affectionately call her, decided to start a business selling traditional food more than 7 years ago. She furnished her backyard with tables, chairs and a small kitchen. Every day, the customers get together around 6 PM to enjoy dishes made with a unique seasoning and an unmatched attention.

Thanks to the earnings she got, she was able to buy a barbecue, a griddle and gas tanks since that is what she uses the most when she works. She also remodeled her house and she can handle her personal expenses.

On the other hand, for her, the loan that VFMéxico offers her signifies a nice change for her business because she will invest in buying meat, soft drinks, gas and plates. "I will work hard to be able to make my dreams come true, " she says with enthusiasm.

Las Delicias thanks the entire team at KIVA for the benefits that increase the productivity of their jobs.

*The picture was taken at Chalia's business. She is dressed in a green blouse.

loans.use: to buy meat, soft drinks, gas and plates.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra continua con sus estudios de la carrera de ingeniería comercial, es una persona que se dedica mucho a sus estudios, ya que quiere ser una buena profesional que pueda ayudar a las demás personas por medio de su carrera. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
Hoy pide de este nuevo préstamo para poder pagar de vuelta las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sandra continues with her studies in her major of commercial engineering. She is a person who dedicates a lot to her studies, since she wants to be a good professional who can help other people through this degree. She says that her previous loan was used to pay the fees for her program, which was a great help.

Today she asks for this new loan to be able to pay the program fees again and, in this way, to be able to continue with her studies as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Cendy

texts.es:
Cendy esta estudiando la carrera de derecho para poder ser una buena abogada, y por medio de sus estudios poder ayudar a su familia y otros seres queridos, comenta que su préstamo anterior le sirvió para poder pagar sus cuotas, y con ello poder estudiar y cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
Cendy hoy pide este nuevo préstamo para poder volver a pagar sus cuotas, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo, y luchando por poder cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Cendy is studying for a degree in law to be able to be a good lawyer and, through her studies, be able to help her family and other loved ones. She says that her previous loan served her to be able to pay her fees and, with it, be able to study and cover this expense she has.

Today, Cendy asks for this new loan to be able to pay her fees again, and in this way be able to continue with her studies as she has been doing, and struggling to be able to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
Cesar es de la ciudad de Encarnación, actualmente está trabajando en una empresa de transporte y también está estudiando para poder ser un buen profesional.
Él está estudiando la carrera de derecho y poder medio de sus estudios quiere ser alguien en la vida y también poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de sus conocimientos.
